name: Feeding Time (xenonghost)
description:
Your neighbor has asked you to take care of their pet, while they are out of town. Always happy to help, you have agreed. Just feed it for a week, how hard can it be?

Controls

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. You can pick up and drop stuff using S or the down arrow.

Hints

  • Food (or a filled bowl) can be an effective lure
  • Use the shelves to move around if the ground is too dangerous
  • Just make sure the filled bowl is within reach of the pet before leaving, it does not need to eat it all
